mapper.select: select * from orderlist where userId = #{userId} order by orderId desc
mapper.insert: insert into orderlist(goodId, userId, skuId, goodName, color, version, price, quantity, orderTime,status,addressName,receiver,phone) values (#{goodId}, #{userId},#{skuId}, #{goodName}, #{color}, #{version}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{orderTime},'待支付',#{addressName},#{receiver},#{phone})
mapper.select: select * from orderlist order by ${prop} ${order} limit #{start},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: update orderlist set status=#{status} where orderId=#{orderId}
mapper.select: select count(orderId)count from orderlist group by DATE_FORMAT(orderTime,'%Y年-第%u周')
select distinct DATE_FORMAT(orderTime,'%Y年-第%u周')week from orderlist
